channel.title: Division on Jessica S. Marquis
channel.description: Recent content in Division on Jessica S. Marquis

item.title: Church, Please!
item.description: Dear Bride of Christ, I love you with a relentless passion that I can’t abandon no matter how ugly or derisive you become. You are the creation and beloved of my Beloved, and so I am inseparably part of you. So, since I can’t leave (which is what I’m best trained in doing), I need to have a literal “Come to Jesus” chat with you. You – we – have forgotten our First Love.
